Employee Lupia:
We would love to tell you our stories in one sitting, but we will run out of stories to tell, then.
That's why we are limiting our story-teeling to 2 times a week. We are re-telling our stories on Wednesday and Saturday. I'm sorry this is the only way we can do it...
Lailly will tell you about one last point that you should know.
She's over there, so go talk to her.
